name: Opening or relocating a support facility
text:
§412:3-506  Opening or relocating a support facility.  A Hawaii financial institution that opens or relocates a support facility shall within thirty days thereafter submit a letter to the commissioner containing the following information:
     (1)  The location of the support facility;
     (2)  A description of the type of functions which the support facility will perform; and
     (3)  The date or anticipated date of opening or relocation. [L 1993, c 350, pt of §1; am L 2006, c 228, §22]
